original_title: Empowering future tech pioneers and digital leaders
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL Nebula Institute of Technology, the educational arm of SLT-MOBITEL, hosted its annual graduation ceremony on November 8, 2024. The prestigious event took place in the main auditorium of the BMICH, Colombo. Celebrating the achievements of its latest cohort of graduates, the graduation ceremony paved pathways for their future success and aspirations. The convocation was the first graduation ceremony held since the brand’s relaunch setting a significant milestone for the Institute.

The Guest of Honour at the Graduation was Prof. Daniel McCluskey, Dean of the School of Physics, Engineering and Computer Science, University of Hertfordshire, UK who delivered a thought-provoking keynote address.

The ceremony marked a significant milestone for students who successfully completed various globally recognised engineering and ICT related specialist programmes offered by the Institute, including the BEng (Hons) Degree Programme conferred by the University of Hertfordshire, UK, as well as the BTEC Higher National Diploma (HND) in Electrical and Electronic Engineering and the BTEC Higher National Diploma (HND) in Digital Technologies awarded by Pearson, UK. This year’s event further demonstrated the Institute’s pledge to nurture the next generation of tech talent in Sri Lanka.
